GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS INFANTRY PRELOAD ATTACK_NEEDS_LINE_OF_SIGHT PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_stunned_landing") end if Prev == "STATE_Selected" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Suppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toSuppressed") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Cover_Unselected" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_COVER_UNSELECT_TO_SELECT") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Cover_Selected" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_COVER_SELECT_TO_UNSELECT") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Idle" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end
